py4j.reflection

Class ReflectionEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • py4j.reflection.ReflectionEngine

  • public class ReflectionEngine
extends Object

    The reflection engine is responsible for accessing the classes, the instances and members in a JVM.

    Author:
    Barthelemy Dagenais
